Package dk.via.sep.server.persistence.userServer

Interface UserDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDAOManager
    public interface UserDAO

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean addUser​(User user)
      This method adds the user to the database after he made his register request.
      void editUser​(User user)
      This edits the user information with the new information coming the the parameter.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getAllAdmins()
      Method that returns all admins from the database.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getAllUsers()
      This return an ArrayList of all the users from the database without any condition on selecting them.
      User getUser​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This returns the user based on the two parameters given, his username and his password.
      boolean removeUser​(User user)
      This removes the user from the database, searching the user by his username, as the username is an unique attribute in the table.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        boolean addUser​(User user)
        This method adds the user to the database after he made his register request. The username, password and email will be stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - this contains the data needed for introducing the user in the database.
        Returns:
        boolean that represents if the action was successful or not.

      • getUser

        User getUser​(java.lang.String username,
             java.lang.String password)
        This returns the user based on the two parameters given, his username and his password.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - the password of the user
        Returns:

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser​(User user)
        This removes the user from the database, searching the user by his username, as the username is an unique attribute in the table.
        Parameters:
        user - contains the information of the user.
        Returns:
        boolean that represents if the action was successful or not.

      • editUser

        void editUser​(User user)
        This edits the user information with the new information coming the the parameter. The parameter contains whatever new information was added, while having the old ID
        Parameters:
        user - this contains the new information of the user with his normal ID.

      • getAllUsers

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getAllUsers()
        This return an ArrayList of all the users from the database without any condition on selecting them.
        Returns:
        an arraylist of the users that are saved in the database.

      • getAllAdmins

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getAllAdmins()
        Method that returns all admins from the database. An admin is an user that has his admin condition set as true.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of users with admin condition as true.
